unnormalised: Haanv, konne tori cricket score-a vixim vicharle, mhunn sang? Mhunnllear, stats-acher laksh divop hanga Bharotaant dhormaxicho! Vichar korun polliaat, soglleank Sachin Tendulkar-ache 100 centuries mahit assat, sory? Tem unchlean unch number. Punn tem fokot vhoddlea milestones-anchoch vixoy nhoi.
normalised: Tor, konnem cricket score-am vixim vicharlem, hã? Mhaka sangtak di, statistics-amcho thav dovornnem mhonnllear Bharotant dharm'vixinchem asa! Vichar kor, Sachin Tendulkarachim ekxim vorsam konnakuch mahit nant? Tem nimannem number. Punn tem fokot vhoddlea milestones vixinchem nhoi.

unnormalised: Eka ganvchea gully cricket match-antui, ami soglle averages ani run rates count kortat. "Kitna hua?" (Kitle zaale?) hem boreach pavtti vichartole prosthn. Mhunnllear, pattlea IPL-ant, CSK-ak 2 over-ant 25 runs zai asle. 25/12, tumak khobor asa? Jhortik! Ani eka zonnank vegllea velar dakhovn dilem MSD-achem career strike rate 135.42 aslem tea vellar.
normalised: Eka thann'nik gully cricket matchentui ami soglle averages ani run rates calculate kortat. "Kitna hua?" (Kitlem zalam?) hem chodd korun vicharchem prashn. Mhonnllear, fattli I-P-L, C-S-K-ak don overs-ant ponchvis runs zai aslem. Ponchvis divided by bara, tujem mahit asa? Intense! Ani konnem tori M-S-D-chem career strike rate tea vellar ekxim teshtis point char don aslem mhonn dakhoun dilem.

unnormalised: Magir kabaddi ani football-achem sonvsarui asa. PKL-ak raiding points assat, tackle percentages – sogllench tem. Football, ami shots on goal, possession percentage, yellow cards… sogllem track kortat. Mhaka ugddas asa ISL final-achea vellar, commentator kitle pass attempt kele teamni mhunn sangtale, kiteak Mumbai City FC-ak 450 ani ATK Mohun Bagan-ak 380.
normalised: Uprant kabaddi ani football-achem vollokhchem sansarui asa. P-K-L-ak raiding points, tackle percentages – hem sogllem jazz. Football, ami shots on goal, possession percentage, yellow cards… soglem track kortat. Mhaka ugddas asa I-S-L finalant, commentator pass kitlem korunk yetolem mhonn sangtalem, Mumbai City F-C vorvim charxim ani ponchvis versus A-T-K Mohun Bagan vorvim tinxim ani aushi.

unnormalised: Nimannem, sports ani numbers ekmekank guntlele assat. Dhoni-achem average, Kohli-achem strike rate, va T20 match-ant kitle sixes marle tea vixim zanna zavpak data-achem analysis korop mukhiel. Mhunn, tumchea calculators-ak tayar dovrat ani khuxalkaien polloat!
normalised: Nimannem, sports ani numbers ektthaim zoddlele asat. Dhoni-chea average, Kohli-chea strike rate, vo fokot T-twenty matchent kitlem sixes marlem mhonn zanna zaunk data analyze korunk sangta. Tor, tumchim calculators tayar dovrat ani khuxal korun polleiat!
